mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, ITEMID, IMPRESSIONS, CLICKS, CLICKTHROUGH, SOLDITEMS, SELLTHROUGH, IMPRESSIONTHROUGH, CREATETIME, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERID, SITEID, SITENAME, LISTINGSTART, LISTINGEND, EBAYSKU, SELLOPER, WATCHERTHROUGH, REFUND, REFUNDRATE, GROSSPROFIT, STATUS, WATCHERS, SALES, MONEYTYPE, VIEWITEM from db_shopmessagehistory where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, ITEMID, IMPRESSIONS, CLICKS, CLICKTHROUGH, SOLDITEMS, SELLTHROUGH, IMPRESSIONTHROUGH, CREATETIME, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERID, SITEID, SITENAME, LISTINGSTART, LISTINGEND, EBAYSKU, SELLOPER, WATCHERTHROUGH, REFUND, REFUNDRATE, GROSSPROFIT, STATUS, WATCHERS, SALES, MONEYTYPE, VIEWITEM from db_shopmessagehistory
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , SHOPID , SHOPNAME , ITEMID , IMPRESSIONS , CLICKS , CLICKTHROUGH , SOLDITEMS , SELLTHROUGH , IMPRESSIONTHROUGH , CREATETIME , OPENFLAG , OPER , OPERID , SITEID , SITENAME , LISTINGSTART , LISTINGEND , EBAYSKU , SELLOPER , WATCHERTHROUGH , REFUND , REFUNDRATE , GROSSPROFIT , STATUS , WATCHERS , SALES , MONEYTYPE , VIEWITEM

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
IMPRESSIONS = #{impressions,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CLICKS = #{clicks,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CLICKTHROUGH = #{clickthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SOLDITEMS = #{solditems,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLTHROUGH = #{sellthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
IMPRESSIONTHROUGH = #{impressionthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERID = #{operid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SITEID = #{siteid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SITENAME = #{sitename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LISTINGSTART = #{listingstart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
LISTINGEND = #{listingend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
EBAYSKU = #{ebaysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SELLOPER = #{selloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
WATCHERTHROUGH = #{watcherthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
REFUND = #{refund,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
REFUNDRATE = #{refundrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
GROSSPROFIT = #{grossprofit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
WATCHERS = #{watchers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SALES = #{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MONEYTYPE = #{moneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
VIEWITEM = #{viewitem,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
IMPRESSIONS = #{impressions,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
CLICKS = #{clicks,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
CLICKTHROUGH = #{clickthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SOLDITEMS = #{solditems,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SELLTHROUGH = #{sellthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
IMPRESSIONTHROUGH = #{impressionthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERID = #{operid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SITEID = #{siteid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SITENAME = #{sitename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
LISTINGSTART = #{listingstart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
LISTINGEND = #{listingend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
EBAYSKU = #{ebaysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SELLOPER = #{selloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
WATCHERTHROUGH = #{watcherthrough,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
REFUND = #{refund,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
REFUNDRATE = #{refundrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
GROSSPROFIT = #{grossprofit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
WATCHERS = #{watchers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SALES = #{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MONEYTYPE = #{moneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
VIEWITEM = #{viewitem,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
, 1=1
